reviewText: it was not advertised as non-usa format

This is a must-have for fans of Wagner's music. It brings to life the story of this complex musical genius who was almost a sociopath. If you enjoy it, consider buying Amazon's Audible course on Wagner and his music, and learn a great deal more than you can from the movie.

It was disappointed about the quality Wagner epic series, during the view I have seen imperfections and many artifacts, you should remaster these masterpieces. Anyhow I am ready to purchase other DVD on Wagner, before that I would like to ask you if it would be possible to exchange the Spanish version  with the English version with Italian subtitles?Another question is :do you have an Italian version?After all the Maestro lived in Italy for a such long time and died in Venice one of his favorite town. Please let me know.
